contents.text: Welcome to Dealpath, based in San Francisco, the real estate industry’s leading cloud-based deal management platform.
For new customer inquiries, including sales and product demonstrations, press '1'.
To speak with our sales team, press '1'.
All of our sales representatives are currently assisting other clients. Please hold for the next available representative.

navigationGoals: Discuss purchasing options and get a pricing overview
As an ex-military veteran starting a real estate portfolio, I want to speak with a sales rep about purchasing Dealpath.
Discuss pricing tiers and API integration with a sales engineer
I need to talk to a sales rep to understand pricing and plan options for Dealpath.
I'd like to speak with a sales representative to discuss academic licensing options.

contents.text: To schedule a live product demonstration, press '2'.
Please stay on the line while we connect you to our demo coordination team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live product demonstration at the earliest availability
As a former service member exploring your platform, I’d like to schedule a live product demonstration of Dealpath.
Arrange a live technical demo of the platform’s API workflow
I want to set up a live demo to see how Dealpath works.
I want to schedule a live demonstration of the platform's deal-tracking features.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press '1'.
Our technical support specialists will be with you shortly. Please hold.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a platform error preventing deal uploads
As a veteran user with an active account, I’m having trouble accessing my dashboard and need technical assistance.
Troubleshoot authentication failure in our API webhook
I need help fixing a login issue with my existing Dealpath account.
I'm having trouble uploading my dataset into the system; I need technical support.

contents.text: For billing inquiries and account management, press '2'.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Update payment details and review recent billing charges
As an ex-military customer, I need help understanding my latest subscription invoice and managing my billing.
Clarify recent invoice charges and update payment credentials
I have a question about a recent bill and need help reviewing my charges.
I need to update my payment method and review my most recent invoice.
